sentences.en: Grandma asked them to all take their seats at the dining table.
sentences.cn: 奶奶请他们坐在餐桌前准备用餐.

sentences.en: Grandma is using the other hoe!
Grandma lives in a quaint old cottage.
sentences.cn: 奶奶住在一栋古色古香的乡间别墅里.

sentences.en: Grandma put her hand on the chair to stay her from falling.
sentences.cn: 奶奶把手放在椅子上杆住自己不致摔倒.
祖母身材圆胖，整天乐呵呵的。

sentences.en: Grandpa and grandma sat in the back of the car.
sentences.cn: 爷爷和奶奶坐在汽车后排的座位上.

sentences.en: Like I always said, you look just like Grandma.
sentences.cn: 我老是说你真像你奶奶.

sentences.en: Malcolm worked up the nerve to ask Grandma Rose for some help.
sentences.cn: 马尔科姆鼓起勇气请罗丝奶奶帮点忙。

sentences.en: My Grandma lost her brother in the war.
sentences.cn: 我祖母在那场战争中失去了兄弟。

sentences.en: On Christmas Eves we go to Grandma's home.
sentences.cn: 每当圣诞前夕我们都到祖母家去.

sentences.en: They handed Grandma down to the ground floor.
sentences.cn: 他们搀扶老奶奶下楼到一楼去.

sentences.en: Unfortunately, Grandma always seems to awaken at awkward moments.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，奶奶好像总是醒来的不是时候。

sentences.en: We listened with bated breath to Grandma's stories of her travels.
sentences.cn: 我们屏住呼吸听祖母讲述她的游历故事。
